subject: Test Case Design
msgSnippet: Hi, I want to write test cases using Junit for a web application. It has framework simialr to struts and uses ejb. Junit itself may not be sufficient to write
messageBody:
Hi,
I want to write test cases using Junit for a web application. It has
framework simialr to struts and uses ejb. Junit itself may not be
sufficient to write the test cases for the entire application and i
may have to use mock objects/cactus.
Though i have some idea about how to test different modules,i am not
able to put them together and develop over-all design approach.I am
looking for high level design for developing these test cases.
Can someone help me by suggesting some articles/books which will help me?

Thanks in advance
